data.actual_result: The cursor changes because of the "View Profile" text since the `cursor: pointer` isn't there for a webhook profile
data.expected_result: The mouse should remain a pointer
data.short_description: Webhook profile popouts still show a text cursor
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message posted by a webhook - Click the webhook name to show the popout - Find the middle of it and observe cursor change
